title: PowerNotes
text: is a research tool that enables students to develop research outlines as they gather information. It can be used as a browser extension for better organization and efficiency.
featureText: PowerNotes is a comprehensive research tool designed to streamline the process of gathering, organizing, and managing information from across the web.

features.title: Content Capture
features.text: PowerNotes allows users to capture content from various sources across the web effortlessly. With its browser extension, users can highlight text directly on webpages and add it to their projects on the fly. This feature ensures that users never lose track of valuable information while conducting online research.

features.title: Organization and Collaboration
features.text: PowerNotes provides robust organization features, enabling users to manage their projects efficiently. Users can create and customize topics with labels and colors, reorder snippets and notes, and add comments to keep ideas fresh and compelling. Additionally, the tool facilitates collaboration among team members, allowing for real-time feedback and seamless management of group work.

features.title: Source-Based Research Framework
features.text: PowerNotes promotes a source-based research framework, helping users prevent plagiarism and improve the quality of their work. By automatically tracking sources and generating citations or bibliographies with a single click, the tool ensures that users can attribute their sources accurately. Moreover, PowerNotes encourages a proven process focused on improving research outcomes, allowing users to dive into more efficient and approachable analysis.
